channel.title: Boxcutter on Petfactory

item.title: Blender - Boxcutter
item.description: Boxcutter official docs Tips Navigation When you have Maya style navigation set up this there is an option to preserve Alt and RMB keys. Preserve Alt : > Preferences > Add-ons > BoxCutter > Keymap > Preserve Alt Preserve RMB : > Preferences > Add-ons > BoxCutter > Keymap > Preserve RMB Cutters Linebox When you use the box shape there is an option called linebox that allows you to easily create Wedge shaped cuts.
